knimeNode.name: ICF
knimeNode.shortDescription: Computes the inverse category frequency (icf) of each term according to the given set of documents, categories of documents respectively, and adds a column containing the icf value.

fullDescription.intro:
Computes the inverse category frequency (icf) of each term according to the given set of documents, categories of documents respectively, and adds a column containing the icf value. The value for term t is computed as follows: icf(t) = log(1 + (f(C) / f(c, t)),
where f(C) is the number of all categories and f(c, t) is the number of categories containing term t.
fullDescription.option: Specifies the document column to use for frequency counting.

inPort.name: Terms and related documents input table

ports.inPort: The input table which contains terms and documents.
ports.outPort: The output table which contains terms documents and a corresponding frequency value.
